duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide tele coverage for child and adolescent psychiatry services for a county outpatient facility.
Conduct initial evaluations for 60 minutes and med checks/follow-ups (OP Only) for 30 minutes per day.
Treat the entire range of mental illnesses from moderate to severe and persistent, as well as some addiction cases.
Flexible schedule with 4 hours per month initially, potential to increase.
